original: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa ni rdo rje snying po nyid de byang phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' klas sgra sgrogs pa ni rdo rje snying po nyid de byang phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: He is the one who proclaims the single sound in the three worlds with eloquence.üîΩHe

original: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni mya ngan dang mun ba'i dgra 'joms pa'i mchog ni mya ngan dang mun pa sel bar 'joms pa ste nub phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: sgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni mya ngan dang mun ba'i dgra 'joms pa'i mchog ni mya ngan dang mun pa sel bar 'joms pa ste nub phyogs nye bar mtshon pa'o //
translated: The best of those endowed with sound is the best of the destroyers of the enemy of sorrow and darkness, which is the destroyer of the darkness of sorrow, which is the west.

original: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bstan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba ni sdug bsngal gcod pa dang bcas pa'o /
analyzed: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis kyis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis bstan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba ni sdug bsngal gcod pa dang bcas pa'o /
translated: Thus, the cakravartin who is taught by the ma·πá·∏çala of the conqueror of the three realms has the cutting off of suffering.

original: // / da ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa ni rig pa'i lha mo la bstod pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: // / da ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa ni rig pa'i lha mo la bstod pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: Now, the entry into the ma·πá·∏çala of the lord of dance of the lotus is the praise of the knowledge goddess.

original: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid de chos bdag med pa nyid dang / yang dag mtha' ste gang zag gi bdag med pa la yi ges brjod du med pa ni padma rigs kyi rdo rje sems ma'o //
analyzed: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid de chos bdag med pa nyid dang / yang dag mtha' ste gang zag gi bdag med pa la yi ges brjod du med pa ni padma rigs kyi rdo rje sems ma'o //
translated: The true selflessness, suchness, and dharma-selflessness, and the perfect end, which is the inexpressible by syllables of the selflessness of persons, is the vajra mind of the lotus family.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i stong pa nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i stong pa nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog ste /
translated: The emptiness of signlessness is the bull of speakers.

original: snying rjes zab pa dang rgya che ba sgra sgrogs pas na padma'i rigs chen mo'o //
analyzed: snying rjes zab pa dang rgya che ba sgra sgrogs pas na padma'i rigs chen mo'o //
translated: The great lotus family, because of proclaiming the profound and the vast with compassion.

original: smon pa med pa'i dang por dge ba'i chos kyi dung gi sgra chen ldan pa dang tha mar dge ba'i sgra chen dang ldan pa ste rdo rje chos ma'o //
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i dang por dge ba'i chos kyi dung gi sgra chen ldan pa dang tha mar dge ba'i sgra chen dang ldan pa ste rdo rje chos ma'o //
translated: The great Dharma conch, because of possessing the great sound of virtue at the beginning and end with wishlessness.

original: 'od gsal ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs bcur brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi rda bo che brdungs pas na chos kyi las ma'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs bcur brtson 'grus kyi chos kyi rda bo che brdungs pas na chos kyi las ma'o //
translated: The great Dharma drum, because of beating the great Dharma drum of effort in the ten directions with the aspect of nonabiding nirvana.

original: mchod pa'i las ma rnams bshad pa /
analyzed: mchod pa'i las ma rnams bshad pa /
translated: The actions of offering are explained.

original: don dam par gzugs med cing kun rdzob tu sbyin pa'i gzugs dam pa ste /
analyzed: don dam par gzugs med cing kun rdzob tu sbyin pa'i gzugs dam pa ste /
translated: The supreme form of generosity, because of being formless in the ultimate and having the supreme form of generosity in the relative.

original: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can yid las skyes pas na padma'i sgeg mo'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs can yid las skyes pas na padma'i sgeg mo'o //
translated: The lotus charm, because of having various forms and being born from the mind.

original: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i gzugs snang ba'i dpal du gyur cing phred ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi don du ma lus 'chang bas na padma'i phreng ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i gzugs snang ba'i dpal du gyur cing phred ba'i gzugs brnyan gyi don du ma lus 'chang bas na padma'i phreng ba'o //
translated: The lotus garland, because of being the glory of the appearance of the form of gathering virtuous Dharmas and because of holding the meaning of the reflection of the garland without exception.

original: khros pas gzhan gyi don mi 'jigs pa'i 'od zer gyis tshugs pa @15a * //
analyzed: khros pas gzhan gyi don mi 'jigs pa'i 'od zer gyis tshugs pa @15a * //
translated: The light rays of fearlessness accomplish the welfare of others.üîΩ

original: med cing cher grags pa'i bzod pa khams gsum gyi 'khor gyi sa bskor ba'o //üîΩche ba'i che bas na padma'i glu ma'o //
analyzed: med cing cher grags pa'i bzod pa khams gsum gyi 'khor gyi sa bskor ba'o // che ba'i che bas na padma'i glu ma'o //
translated: The lotus songstress is the patience of great fame, which is not overcome by the light rays of the anger of others, and which pervades the retinue of the three realms.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni shin tu mtho ba la gnas shing dar ba chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs bsnyems pas na padma'i gar ma'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni shin tu mtho ba la gnas shing dar ba chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs bsnyems pas na padma'i gar ma'o //
translated: The lotus dancer is the pride of the power of great effort, which is the support of the very high path of the bodhisattva.

original: 'jig rten du gzhon nu'i lus bzung nas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i bsam gtan yun ring po'i gnyen po'i skye dgu'i bdag po ni padma'i bdug pa ma'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten du gzhon nu'i lus bzung nas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa'i bsam gtan yun ring po'i gnyen po'i skye dgu'i bdag po ni padma'i bdug pa ma'o //
translated: The lotus incense is the lord of beings, the long-lasting antidote of the concentration of perfect qualities, who takes on the body of a youth in the world.

original: shes rab kyi stobs kyis 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos shing lhag mthong gis mi zad pas na sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan 'chang bas na padma'i me tog ma'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi stobs kyis 'khor ba'i nyes pas ma gos shing lhag mthong gis mi zad pas na sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi mtshan 'chang bas na padma'i me tog ma'o //
translated: The lotus flower is the bearer of the thirty-two marks, who is not soiled by the faults of cyclic existence by the power of wisdom, and who is inexhaustible by means of insight.

original: ye shes dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis //
analyzed: ye shes dang smon lam gyi stobs kyis //
translated: By the power of wisdom and prayer,

original: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
analyzed: 'jig rten shes legs slob dpon te //
translated: the world is the master of good knowledge.

original: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mnga' ba'i slob dpon 'jigs pa med pa ni padma'i mar me ma'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa bzhi mnga' ba'i slob dpon 'jigs pa med pa ni padma'i mar me ma'o //
translated: The fearless master who possesses the four forms of fearlessness is Padmapradƒ´pƒÅ.

original: thams cad kyi mgon pos skyob cing 'jig rten gsum na yid gcugs pas /
analyzed: thams cad kyi mgon pos skyob cing 'jig rten gsum na yid gcugs pas /
translated: The protector of all, who protects the three worlds and is trusted by all,

original: 'das pa bskyabs pa dang da ltar bskyabs nas ma 'ongs pa skyob pas na bla na med pa ste padma'i dri ma'o //
analyzed: 'das pa bskyabs pa dang da ltar bskyabs nas ma 'ongs pa skyob pas na bla na med pa ste padma'i dri ma'o //
translated: protects the past, protects the present, and will protect the future. Thus, he is unsurpassed and is PadmagandhƒÅ.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang du mdzad nas ye shes rnams la chags pa dang thogs pa mi mnga' zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i dri ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho sdug bsngal gyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbang du mdzad nas ye shes rnams la chags pa dang thogs pa mi mnga' zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i dri ma med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho sdug bsngal gyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs 'byed cing /
translated: With regard to Vairocana, he is the ocean of stainless omniscient wisdom, which is free from attachment and obstruction with regard to all objects of knowledge. He opens the eggshell of ignorance that is the cause of suffering.

original: kun gyi srid pa'i dra ba bcom nas gzhan gyi rgyud nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zhi bar mdzad cing 'bras bu 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin nas rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes dbang bskur cod pan ni rin po che'i
analyzed: kun gyi srid pa'i dra ba bcom nas gzhan gyi rgyud nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zhi bar mdzad cing 'bras bu 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu phyin nas rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes dbang bskur cod pan ni rin po che'i
translated: He has destroyed the net of all existence, and has pacified all the defilements in the mental series of others. Having gone beyond the ocean of cyclic existence, which is the fruit of karma, he has attained the intuition consecration which is the perfect fulfillment of one's own and others' aims. He is the jewel diadem.

original: cod pan can no //
analyzed: cod pan can no //
translated: He is the diademed one.

original: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs pa ni sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi do shal mnga' ba rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs pa ni sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa gcig gi do shal mnga' ba rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: He is the perfect Buddha, the ornament, the wearer of the necklace of twenty-one Buddhas, Vairocana.

original: snying rjes 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad cing byams pas khams gsum gyi sgrib pa bsal nas theg pa gsum gyis rnam par grol ba thob pa klu shing bsnams pa ni byams pa'o //
analyzed: snying rjes 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar mdzad cing byams pas khams gsum gyi sgrib pa bsal nas theg pa gsum gyis rnam par grol ba thob pa klu shing bsnams pa ni byams pa'o //
translated: He is the one who pacifies the suffering of the formative forces through compassion, the suffering of change through equanimity, and the suffering of suffering through loving kindness. He is the one who, through loving kindness, removes the obstructions of the three worlds and causes the attainment of liberation through the three vehicles. He is the one who holds the nƒÅgapu·π£pa. He is Maitreya.

original: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol ba'i ral gri bsnams shing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i po ti bsnams pa ni 'jam dpal lo //
analyzed: sgrib pa kun las nges par grol ba'i ral gri bsnams shing nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i po ti bsnams pa ni 'jam dpal lo //
translated: He holds a sword that is completely free from all obscurations and a book that is as even as space.

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun las 'das pa'i dung bsnams shing kun rdzob @15b kyi dus gsum don dam par dus med par rtogs pa'i chu bsnams pa ni spos kyi glang po'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun las 'das pa'i dung bsnams shing kun rdzob @15b kyi dus gsum don dam par dus med par rtogs pa'i chu bsnams pa ni spos kyi glang po'o //
translated: He holds a conch that is beyond all afflictive obscurations and water that is the ultimate timelessness of the three times in the relative.

original: sems can rnams kyi nang na ye shes kyi gtso bo yon tan thod can rnams kyi cod pan me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa bsnams pa ni ye shes tog go //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi nang na ye shes kyi gtso bo yon tan thod can rnams kyi cod pan me tog gi phreng ba dang bcas pa bsnams pa ni ye shes tog go //
translated: He holds a crown of flowers that is the chief of wisdoms among sentient beings and the diadem of those with excellent qualities.

original: nyon mongs pa'i lus kun las rnam par grol zhing nam mkha' la gnas pa'i gter gyi mdzod phyag na bsnams pa ni bzang skyong ngo //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i lus kun las rnam par grol zhing nam mkha' la gnas pa'i gter gyi mdzod phyag na bsnams pa ni bzang skyong ngo //
translated: He holds in his hand a treasure chest that is completely free from the body of afflictions and that abides in space.

original: yid bzhin nor bu 'chang zhing sems can kun la khyab pas rin po che'i mdzod ster bas blo gros rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu 'chang zhing sems can kun la khyab pas rin po che'i mdzod ster bas blo gros rgya mtsho'o //
translated: He holds a wish-fulfilling jewel and gives a treasure of jewels to all sentient beings because he pervades them all.

original: dpag bsam gyi shing dang bum pa bzang po phyag na bsnams pas blo gros mi zad pa'o //üîΩso sor rtog pa'i byed pas sems can kun gyi don byed pa'i padma dang phan 'dogs pa'i po ti bsnams pas /
analyzed: dpag bsam gyi shing dang bum pa bzang po phyag na bsnams pas blo gros mi zad pa'o // so sor rtog pa'i byed pas sems can kun gyi don byed pa'i padma dang phan 'dogs pa'i po ti bsnams pas /
translated: He holds a wish-fulfilling tree and an excellent vase, and so is Ak·π£ayamati.

original: sems can gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te spobs pa brtsegs pa'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te spobs pa brtsegs pa'o //
translated: He holds a lotus and a helpful book, and so is the spiritual friend of sentient beings, and so is PratibhƒÅnak≈´·π≠a.

original: las rgyu 'bras bzang ngan shes shing sems can 'dul ba'i dus shes pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i dam tshig shes pa'i ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa ni mthu chen thob pa'o //
analyzed: las rgyu 'bras bzang ngan shes shing sems can 'dul ba'i dus shes pa la phyir mi ldog pa'i dam tshig shes pa'i ral gri phyag na bsnams pa'i dam tshig dang ldan pa ni mthu chen thob pa'o //
translated: He holds a sword in his hand, and so is endowed with the commitment of knowing the irreversible commitment of knowing good and bad causes and effects and knowing the time to tame sentient beings, and so is MahƒÅsthƒÅmaprƒÅpta.

original: dus gsum mkhyen cing 'dul ba'i sems can gyi dbang po rab 'bring shes shing theg pa gsum gyis rnam par grol ba la mkhas pa'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa ni ngan song kun 'dren pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum mkhyen cing 'dul ba'i sems can gyi dbang po rab 'bring shes shing theg pa gsum gyis rnam par grol ba la mkhas pa'i rgyal mtshan bsnams pa ni ngan song kun 'dren pa'o //
translated: He holds a banner, and so is skilled in the three vehicles that liberate sentient beings, and so is Sarvanƒ´vara·πáavi·π£kambhin.

original: rang nyid yon tan dang ldan zhing gzhan gyi yon tan shes shing mya ngan dang bral ba'i chos shes pa'i bkra shis las byung ba'i dpal gyi be'u phyag na bsnams pa ni mya ngan dang mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros so //üîΩbkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa ni g-yung drung 'khyil pa phyag na bsnams pa /
analyzed: rang nyid yon tan dang ldan zhing gzhan gyi yon tan shes shing mya ngan dang bral ba'i chos shes pa'i bkra shis las byung ba'i dpal gyi be'u phyag na bsnams pa ni mya ngan dang mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros so // bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa ni g-yung drung 'khyil pa phyag na bsnams pa /
translated: The one holding in his hand the auspicious calf of glory born of the auspiciousness of his own possession of good qualities, his knowledge of the good qualities of others, and his knowledge of the Dharma free from sorrow, is the intelligence which definitely conquers sorrow and darkness.

original: sems can la phan pa'i grags pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i bkra shis dang sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i snyan grags dge ste dra ba can gyi 'od do //
analyzed: sems can la phan pa'i grags pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i bkra shis dang sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i snyan grags dge ste dra ba can gyi 'od do //
translated: The one holding in his hand the auspiciousness of all auspiciousness, the auspiciousness of the perfection of the two collections of fame which benefits sentient beings, and the auspiciousness of the abandonment of the two obscurations, is the auspiciousness of the fame of the net of light.

original: phyir mi ldog pas na dbugs 'byin chen po ste /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pas na dbugs 'byin chen po ste /
translated: The one who is not turned back is the great sigh.

original: sems can rnams dga' bar byed pas na dga' ston che ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams dga' bar byed pas na dga' ston che ste /
translated: The one who delights sentient beings is the great festival.

original: zla bas mtshan pa'i gdugs kyi rol mo chen po 'chang bas na zla 'od gzhon nu'o //
analyzed: zla bas mtshan pa'i gdugs kyi rol mo chen po 'chang bas na zla 'od gzhon nu'o //
translated: The one holding the great play of the moon-marked parasol is the youth of moon-light.

original: so sor rtog pa'i bkur sti dang rim gro phun sum tshogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa mnga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba'i padma'i steng na grags pa'i bdag nyid kyi dpal gyi ral gri bsnams pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //üîΩnam mkha' @16a * //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i bkur sti dang rim gro phun sum tshogs pa 'od dpag tu med pa mnga' zhing mchog tu dga' ba'i padma'i steng na grags pa'i bdag nyid kyi dpal gyi ral gri bsnams pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o // nam mkha' @16a * //
translated: The one who is endowed with the perfect respect and service of discriminating wisdom, who holds the sword of glory of the nature of fame on the lotus of supreme joy, is AmitƒÅbha.

original: mdzod mchog dang ldan zhing rin po che'i mdzod kyi mchog phyag na bsnams pa'i gtso bo ste /
analyzed: mdzod mchog dang ldan zhing rin po che'i mdzod kyi mchog phyag na bsnams pa'i gtso bo ste /
translated: The one who is endowed with the supreme treasure of space, who holds in his hand the supreme treasure of jewels, is the chief.

original: skyabs rnams kyi mchog nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: skyabs rnams kyi mchog nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: The supreme refuge is ƒÄkƒÅ≈õagarbha.

original: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad ni dgra ste /
analyzed: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad ni dgra ste /
translated: The eight great fears are enemies.

original: de skyob ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje rab kyi mchog dang 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba'i ral gri phyag na bsnams pa ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: de skyob ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje rab kyi mchog dang 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba'i ral gri phyag na bsnams pa ni sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
translated: The one who protects from them, who holds in his hand the supreme vajra cross for protection and the sword for removing all fears, is Avalokite≈õvara.

original: mi bskyod pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas tshigs su bcad pa drug ste /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas tshigs su bcad pa drug ste /
translated: Six verses on the retinue of Ak·π£hobhya.

original: de la ; gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo can gyi rma bya'i mdongs bzhin du dbu lcang lo bcings pa'o //
analyzed: de la ; gtsug phud phud pu lcang lo can gyi rma bya'i mdongs bzhin du dbu lcang lo bcings pa'o //
translated: His hair is bound up in a topknot, like the peacock's tail in the grove of Alakavati.üîΩHe has a diadem of matted hair bound with munja grass.

original: munydzas bcings pa'i ral pa'i cod pan ni gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan ni gdong lnga la cod pa na nyi shu mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: munydzas bcings pa'i ral pa'i cod pan ni gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan ni gdong lnga la cod pa na nyi shu mnga' ba'o //
translated: He has five locks of hair, and five faces.

original: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod ni cod pan gyi bar nas me tog phreng ba'o //üîΩmgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
analyzed: zur phud lnga pa me tog thod ni cod pan gyi bar nas me tog phreng ba'o // mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang //
translated: He has five topknots, and a garland of flowers.üîΩHe has a shaven head, and great observances.

original: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog ni zhal steng ma rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs can no //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog ni zhal steng ma rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs can no //
translated: He has the supreme observance of pure conduct.

original: de ltar zhal lnga ni ye shes lnga'i rnam par dag pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar zhal lnga ni ye shes lnga'i rnam par dag pa'o //
translated: Thus, his five faces are the purity of the five wisdoms.

original: sems can la phan pa'i smon lam mthar phyin cing 'khor ba ji srid par dam bcas pas na dka' thub che ba'o //
analyzed: sems can la phan pa'i smon lam mthar phyin cing 'khor ba ji srid par dam bcas pas na dka' thub che ba'o //
translated: He has great austerities, because he has fulfilled his vow to benefit sentient beings and has vowed to remain in cyclic existence.

original: zhal steng ma de ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: zhal steng ma de ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is the upper face like?

original: gtsang gnas dam pa goo ta ma'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'o //
analyzed: gtsang gnas dam pa goo ta ma'i rigs su 'khrungs pa'o //
translated: It is born in the pure caste of the noble Gautama family.

original: bram ze tshangs pa ni lam gzhan las bstod pa'o //
analyzed: bram ze tshangs pa ni lam gzhan las bstod pa'o //
translated: The Brahman is the praise of the path from another.

original: tshangs pa shes ni lam mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa shes ni lam mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Brahma-knowledge is the knowledge of the path.

original: mya ngan 'das pa thob pa ni slob pa'i lam me long lta bu thob pa'o //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa thob pa ni slob pa'i lam me long lta bu thob pa'o //
translated: The attainment of nirvana is the attainment of the mirror-like path of learning.

original: grol ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lags so //
analyzed: grol ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lags so //
translated: Liberation is from the obscurations of affliction.

original: rnam par grol ba'i lus ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las so ;
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i lus ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa las so ;
translated: The liberated body is from the obscurations of meditative equipoise.

original: / grol ba ni nyan thos kyi'o //
analyzed: / grol ba ni nyan thos kyi'o //
translated: Liberation is of the Sravakas.

original: zhi ba theg pa chen po ste de'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba theg pa chen po ste de'i bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o //
translated: Peace is the Mahayana, which is Vajrasattva.

original: mya ngan 'das pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las so //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa las so //
translated: Nirvana is from the obscurations of affliction.

original: mya ngan 'das pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las so //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa las so //
translated: Nirvana is from the obscurations of knowledge.

original: legs par ni thugs rje'o //
analyzed: legs par ni thugs rje'o //
translated: Well is compassion.

original: mya ngan 'das pa ni shes rab kyis so //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das pa ni shes rab kyis so //
translated: Nirvana is by wisdom.

original: nye ba ni rab tu mi gnas pa la nye ba'o //
analyzed: nye ba ni rab tu mi gnas pa la nye ba'o //
translated: Near is near to non-abiding.

original: bde sdug sel ba'i mthar gyur pa ni srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: bde sdug sel ba'i mthar gyur pa ni srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: The end of the removal of happiness and suffering is not abiding in existence or peace.

original: chags bral ni sgrib pa las so //
analyzed: chags bral ni sgrib pa las so //
translated: Freedom from attachment is from the obscurations.

original: lus las 'das pa ni bag la nyal ba spangs pa ste rdo rje rgyal po'o //
analyzed: lus las 'das pa ni bag la nyal ba spangs pa ste rdo rje rgyal po'o //
translated: Transcending the body is the abandonment of the latent tendencies, which is the vajra king.

original: thub pa med pa ni ser sna spangs pa'o //üîΩdpe med pa ni 'chal pa'i tshul @16b khrims spangs pa'o //
analyzed: thub pa med pa ni ser sna spangs pa'o // dpe med pa ni 'chal pa'i tshul @16b khrims spangs pa'o //
translated: Being invincible is the abandonment of stinginess.üîΩBeing incomparable is the abandonment of immorality.

original: mi mngon pa ni khong khro ba spangs pa'o //üîΩmi snang ba ni le lo dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mi mngon pa ni khong khro ba spangs pa'o // mi snang ba ni le lo dang bral ba'o //
translated: Being imperceptible is the abandonment of anger.üîΩBeing invisible is being free from laziness.

original: gsal byed min ni g-yeng pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gsal byed min ni g-yeng pa med pa'o //
translated: Being unmanifest is being free from distraction.

original: mi 'gyur pa ni 'chal ba'i shes rab dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mi 'gyur pa ni 'chal ba'i shes rab dang bral ba'o //
translated: Being unchanging is being free from faulty wisdom.

original: theg pa gsum 'gro ba la smin cing grol ba la khyab pa po ste /
analyzed: theg pa gsum 'gro ba la smin cing grol ba la khyab pa po ste /
translated: It is the one who pervades the ripening and liberation of those who go to the three vehicles.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis mdangs phra zhing zag pa sa bon dang bral ba ni rdo rje chags pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis mdangs phra zhing zag pa sa bon dang bral ba ni rdo rje chags pa'o //
translated: Vajra passion is the subtle radiance of the nature of the dharmadhatu, free from the seeds of defilement.

original: rdul med ni sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: rdul med ni sbyin pa'o //
translated: Being without dust is generosity.

original: rdul bral ni tshul khrims so //
analyzed: rdul bral ni tshul khrims so //
translated: Being free from dust is moral discipline.

original: dri ma med pa ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: dri ma med pa ni bzod pa'o //
translated: Being stainless is patience.

original: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa ni brtson 'grus so //
analyzed: nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa ni brtson 'grus so //
translated: Being faultless is diligence.

original: rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sad par byed pas na bsam gtan no //
analyzed: rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu sad par byed pas na bsam gtan no //
translated: Meditation is the vajra-applause, because it awakens the Tathagatas.

original: ji snyed pa kun shes shing ji lta ba kun rig mnga' ba ni shes rab dam pa ste /
analyzed: ji snyed pa kun shes shing ji lta ba kun rig mnga' ba ni shes rab dam pa ste /
translated: The highest wisdom is the knowledge of all that is, and the understanding of all that is not.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ste rdo rje legs pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ste rdo rje legs pa'o //
translated: This is the practice of the perfections, and is the vajra-goodness.

original: rin chen gtsug tor gyi dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa /
analyzed: rin chen gtsug tor gyi dbang du mdzad nas bshad pa /
translated: Now, with reference to the Ratna-usnisa, it is said:

original: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das //
translated: The past reality of consciousness

original: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gnas 'gyur ba'i 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa gnas 'gyur ba'i 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: is the clear light of the transformation of consciousness.

original: gnyis med ye shes tshul 'chang ba ni zung 'jug gi'o //
analyzed: gnyis med ye shes tshul 'chang ba ni zung 'jug gi'o //
translated: The bearer of the non-dual wisdom is the body of union.

original: rnam par mi rtog lhun gyis grub ni rin chen gtsug phud sku mdog ser po zhal lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog lhun gyis grub ni rin chen gtsug phud sku mdog ser po zhal lnga pa'o //
translated: The non-conceptual spontaneous is the yellow five-faced body of Ratna-usnisa.

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rin chen gtsug phud dang / dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs kar bzhugs pa dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas w'a g'i shva ra'o //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rin chen gtsug phud dang / dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs kar bzhugs pa dang / ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas w'a g'i shva ra'o //
translated: The one who acts as the buddhas of the three times is the present buddha Ratna≈õikhin, who resides in the heart of the primordial buddha, and the future buddha VƒÅgƒ´≈õvara.

original: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med //
translated: The buddha without beginning or end

original: dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa ni thugs kar zhal lnga phyag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: dang po sangs rgyas rgyu med pa ni thugs kar zhal lnga phyag brgyad pa'o //
translated: The five-faced, eight-armed one in the heart is the primordial buddha without cause.

original: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
analyzed: ye shes mig gcig dri ma med //
translated: The one with the single eye of wisdom, stainless,

original: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
analyzed: ye shes lus can de bzhin gshegs //
translated: the one with a body of wisdom, the tathƒÅgata,

original: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i spyan gcig dang ldan pa'i w'a g'i shva ra'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i spyan gcig dang ldan pa'i w'a g'i shva ra'o //
translated: is VƒÅgƒ´≈õvara, who has a single eye of nonduality.

original: rdo rje bzhad pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: With regard to the vajra smile,

original: tshig gi dbang phyug ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: tshig gi dbang phyug ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
translated: the lord of speech is right view.

original: smra ba chen po ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o //üîΩsmra ba'i skyes mchog ni yang dag pa'i ngag go //
analyzed: smra ba chen po ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o // smra ba'i skyes mchog ni yang dag pa'i ngag go //
translated: The great speaker is right thought.üîΩThe best of speakers is right speech.

original: smra ba'i rgyal ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
analyzed: smra ba'i rgyal ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o //
translated: The king of speakers is right action.

original: smra ba'i dam pa ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
analyzed: smra ba'i dam pa ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o //
translated: The best of speakers is right livelihood.

original: mchog gi gnas ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
analyzed: mchog gi gnas ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o //
translated: The supreme state is right effort.

original: smra ba'i seng ge ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
analyzed: smra ba'i seng ge ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o //
translated: The lion of speakers is right mindfulness.

original: tshugs pa med pa ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: tshugs pa med pa ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: The invincible is right concentration.

original: rdo rje bzhad pa zhal bcu gcig pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bzhad pa zhal bcu gcig pa'o //
translated: The eleven-faced Vajra Laughter.

original: kun du lta ba ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'o //üîΩmchog @17a * //
analyzed: kun du lta ba ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa'o // mchog @17a * //
translated: The all-seer protects from the fear of lions.

original: tu dga' ba ni glang po'i 'jigs pa las so //
analyzed: tu dga' ba ni glang po'i 'jigs pa las so //
translated: The supreme joy protects from the fear of elephants.

original: gzi brjid phreng ba ni me'i 'jigs pa las so //
analyzed: gzi brjid phreng ba ni me'i 'jigs pa las so //
translated: The garland of splendor protects from the fear of fire.

original: lta na sdug pa ni sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las so //
analyzed: lta na sdug pa ni sbrul gyi 'jigs pa las so //
translated: The beautiful to behold protects from the fear of snakes.

original: 'od 'bar ba ni mtshon gyi 'jigs pa las so //
analyzed: 'od 'bar ba ni mtshon gyi 'jigs pa las so //
translated: The blazing light protects from the fear of weapons.

original: dpal gyi be'u ni rkun mo'i 'jigs pa las so //
analyzed: dpal gyi be'u ni rkun mo'i 'jigs pa las so //
translated: The svastika protects from the fear of thieves.

original: lag na 'od 'bar ba ni sha za'i 'jigs pa las so //
analyzed: lag na 'od 'bar ba ni sha za'i 'jigs pa las so //
translated: The blazing-handed protects from the fear of pi≈õƒÅcas.

original: snang ba po ni rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs kyi 'jigs pa las skyob pas na 'jig rten pa'i 'jigs pa brgyad skyob pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba po ni rgya mtsho'i rba rlabs kyi 'jigs pa las skyob pas na 'jig rten pa'i 'jigs pa brgyad skyob pa'o //
translated: The illuminator protects from the fear of ocean waves. Thus it protects from the eight worldly fears.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa ni /
translated: It protects from the fear of the world.

original: sman ba che mchog gtso bo ste //
analyzed: sman ba che mchog gtso bo ste //
translated: It is the supreme, chief physician,

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa gso ba'o //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa gso ba'o //
translated: the healer of the obscurations of knowledge.

original: nyon mongs pa'i zug rdu 'byin pa ste bla na med pa'o //üîΩnyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i bag la nyal ba ma lus pa 'joms pas na /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i zug rdu 'byin pa ste bla na med pa'o // nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i bag la nyal ba ma lus pa 'joms pas na /
translated: It is the unsurpassed remover of the pain of the afflictions.

original: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ngo //
analyzed: sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing ngo //
translated: It is the tree of all medicines,

original: lam lnga'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa spong bas na /
analyzed: lam lnga'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa spong bas na /
translated: for it destroys all the latent tendencies of the afflictions and the obscurations of knowledge.

original: nad do cog gi dgra che ba ste /
analyzed: nad do cog gi dgra che ba ste /
translated: It is the great enemy of all disease,

original: lha nyi ma'i gzugs can no //
analyzed: lha nyi ma'i gzugs can no //
translated: the god with the form of the sun.

original: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ni phun sum tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: sdu gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ni phun sum tshogs pa'o //
translated: It is the most beautiful in the three worlds,üîΩthe glorious one with the mandala of the lunar mansions,

original: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor can ni rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
translated: surrounded by the twenty-eight lunar mansions.üîΩIt is the one who raises the victory banner of the Dharma

original: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa //üîΩchos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs pa ni byams pa'i 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa // chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs pa ni byams pa'i 'bras bu'o //
translated: to the ends of the ten directions and the limits of space.

original: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
analyzed: 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste //
translated: It is the one parasol of the world,üîΩthe one who covers the world with compassion.

original: byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can ni snying rje dang byams ba'i bdag nyid do //üîΩdpal ldan ni zla ba'i gzugs can padma ni 'dir ku mu da ste steng na gar mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can ni snying rje dang byams ba'i bdag nyid do // dpal ldan ni zla ba'i gzugs can padma ni 'dir ku mu da ste steng na gar mdzad pa'o //
translated: The nature of love and compassion is the nature of compassion and love.üîΩThe glorious one is the moon-formed one, the lotus is the night lotus, and he dances upon it.

original: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs ni phyag mtshan te zla ba'i rgyal mtshan no //
analyzed: khyab bdag chen po rin chen gdugs ni phyag mtshan te zla ba'i rgyal mtshan no //
translated: The great lord is the jewel parasol, the symbol, the moon banner.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che ni sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gzi brjid che ni sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan mnga' ba'o //
translated: The great splendor of all buddhas is the possession of the diadem of the five buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba ni sku'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba ni sku'i sgo nas so //
translated: The body of all buddhas is in terms of the body.

original: rnal 'byor che ni thugs kyi sgo nas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor che ni thugs kyi sgo nas so //
translated: The great yoga is in terms of the mind.

original: bstan pa gcig ni gsung gi sgo nas so //
analyzed: bstan pa gcig ni gsung gi sgo nas so //
translated: The one teaching is in terms of speech.üîΩ The glory of the consecration of the vajra jewel is in terms of the consecration of the name.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.

original: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal ni ming gi dbang bskur ba'i sgo nas so //
translated: The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.

original: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //üîΩrin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste //üîΩrin po che'i rigs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgo nas so //
translated: The lord of all jewels is in terms of the consecration of the jewel family.üîΩ The lord of

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag ni sems can kun la dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag ni sems can kun la dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The Lord of the Lords of the World is the consecration of all sentient beings.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun la dbang bskur ba'i bdag po ste rdo rje rin chen no //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun la dbang bskur ba'i bdag po ste rdo rje rin chen no //
translated: The Lord of the Lords of all Vajradharas is the Lord of the consecration of all Tathagatas, the Vajra Jewel.

original: snang ba mtha' yas padma'i ting nge @17b 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas padma'i ting nge @17b 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: With reference to the samadhi of the lotus of Amitabha,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba ni dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba ni dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs la gnas pa'o //
translated: the Great Mind of all Buddhas is the abode of the mind of the Primordial Buddha.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba //
translated: The Great Body of all Buddhas

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin //
translated: is also the Speech of all Buddhas.

original: thugs ka'i badzra t'ikshna'o //
analyzed: thugs ka'i badzra t'ikshna'o //
translated: The Vajra TIKSHNA at the heart.

original: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ni rang nyid nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che ni rang nyid nyi ma'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
translated: The Great Light of the Vajra Sun is the light of the sun itself.

original: rdo rje zla ba dri med ni dang po'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje zla ba dri med ni dang po'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'o //
translated: The Stainless Vajra Moon is the light of the moon of the Primordial Buddha.

original: chags bral ni mya ngan las 'das pa las so //
analyzed: chags bral ni mya ngan las 'das pa las so //
translated: The Free from Passion is from nirvana.

original: sogs pas bsdus pa ni chags pa ste 'khor ba'o //
analyzed: sogs pas bsdus pa ni chags pa ste 'khor ba'o //
translated: The Passion, etc., is samsara.

original: chags pa ni gnyis ka la mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: chags pa ni gnyis ka la mi gnas pa'o //
translated: Attachment is not dwelling in either.

original: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba ni sku mdog dmar po 'od zer dmar ba'o //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba ni sku mdog dmar po 'od zer dmar ba'o //
translated: Blazing with various colors is a red-colored body with red light rays.

original: rdo rje skyil krung ni bzhugs stangs so //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung ni bzhugs stangs so //
translated: Vajra posture is the sitting position.

original: 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa ni padma bsnams pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa ni padma bsnams pa ste /
translated: Holder of the dharma of migrating beings is holding a lotus.

original: sems can la dmigs pa'i snang ba mtha' yas so //
analyzed: sems can la dmigs pa'i snang ba mtha' yas so //
translated: AmitƒÅbha is the focus on sentient beings.

original: rdo rje chos bshad pa /
analyzed: rdo rje chos bshad pa /
translated: Expounding the dharma of the vajra is the speech.

original: sangs rgyas skyes ni snang ba mtha' yas las skyes pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas skyes ni snang ba mtha' yas las skyes pa'o //
translated: Born from the Buddha is born from AmitƒÅbha.

original: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa ni g-yon pas padma'i yu ba bzung nas g-yas pas 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa ni g-yon pas padma'i yu ba bzung nas g-yas pas 'byed pa'o //
translated: Holder of the treasure of omniscient wisdom is holding the stem of the lotus with the left hand and opening it with the right hand.

original: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni 'gro ba 'dul ba kun gzugs so //
analyzed: rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang ni 'gro ba 'dul ba kun gzugs so //
translated: King of various magical displays is the form of all those who tame migrating beings.

original: che ba sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas rig sngags kyi bdag po dbu la 'chang ba ste padma'i sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: che ba sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas rig sngags kyi bdag po dbu la 'chang ba ste padma'i sgrol ma'o //
translated: The great one is Padmodbhava, who holds on his head the lord of vidyƒÅ mantras, the Buddha AmitƒÅbha.

original: rdo rje rnon po'i tshig bcad gcig ni go sla'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po'i tshig bcad gcig ni go sla'o //
translated: The one verse of the sharp vajra is easy to understand.

original: khyab 'jug gi gzugs can rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik ste bla na med pa'i rgyal bas rgyal ba'o //
analyzed: khyab 'jug gi gzugs can rdo rje zab mo dzin dzik ste bla na med pa'i rgyal bas rgyal ba'o //
translated: Vajra-profound-being, the form of Vishnu, is the unsurpassable conqueror of the conquerors.

original: rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig ni rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa mkhyen pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje blo gros don bzhin rig ni rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa mkhyen pa'o //
translated: Vajra-wisdom, knowing reality, is the knowledge of the magical emanations of miracles.

original: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa ni pha rol phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa'i sa bcu rdzogs pas na rgyan dang ldan pa ste rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa ni pha rol phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa'i sa bcu rdzogs pas na rgyan dang ldan pa ste rdo rje 'khor lo'o //
translated: Perfected in all perfections, is the perfection of the ten perfections, the perfection of the ten grounds, the ornament, the vajra wheel.

original: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa bdag med chos ni chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
translated: Pure, selfless phenomena, is the Dharma, the Dharma discernment.

original: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang ni spobs pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag ye shes zla 'od bzang ni spobs pa'o //
translated: Excellent moon-light of perfect wisdom, is the eloquence.

original: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni nges pa'i tshig go //
analyzed: brtson chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni nges pa'i tshig go //
translated: Great effort, magical net, is the etymology.

original: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog ni don so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
analyzed: rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog ni don so so yang dag par rig pa ste /
translated: Supreme lord of all tantras, is the meaning discernment.

original: tshangs pa'i gzugs can gyis gsungs ba'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gzugs can gyis gsungs ba'o //
translated: Spoken by the one with the form of Brahma.

original: don yod grub pa'i padma'i nges pa'i dbang phyug gi dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i padma'i nges pa'i dbang phyug gi dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: With regard to the lotus lord of Amoghasiddhi,

original: rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan ni rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo //üîΩye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang ni dzny'a na k'a ya'o //üîΩkun du bzang po blo gros bzang ni thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir dang po'i @18a * //
analyzed: rdo rje gdan ni ma lus ldan ni rdo rje skyil mo krung ngo // ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang ni dzny'a na k'a ya'o // kun du bzang po blo gros bzang ni thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir dang po'i @18a * //
translated: The one who holds all the bodies of intuition is the intuition body.üîΩThe one with the good thought of universal goodness is the first Buddha, because he pervades all.

original: sangs rgyas so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas so //
translated: The one who holds the essence of all Buddhas is the essence of the vow of morality, because it is the essence of the vow of morality of all Buddhas.

original: sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin ni bya ba nan tan gyis 'gro ba rnams mi gtong ba ste don yod grub pa'o //
analyzed: sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin ni bya ba nan tan gyis 'gro ba rnams mi gtong ba ste don yod grub pa'o //
translated: The one who holds the essence of the earth is the essence of the vow of patience, because it is the essence of the patience of all Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che ste sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo yin pas na /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che ste sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo yin pas na /
translated: The one who holds the essence of all Buddhas is the essence of the vow of effort, because it is the essence of the effort of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the various emanation wheels is the essence of the vow of meditation, because it is the essence of the meditation of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of all things is the essence of the vow of wisdom, because it is the essence of the wisdom of all Buddhas.

original: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ste zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ba rdo rje las so //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ste zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang ba rdo rje las so //
translated: The one who holds the essence of all Buddhas is the essence of the vow of power, because it is the essence of the power of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of all things is the essence of the vow of knowledge, because it is the essence of the knowledge of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of the earth is the essence of the vow of commitment, because it is the essence of the commitment of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of all Buddhas is the essence of the vow of truth, because it is the essence of the truth of all Buddhas.

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang ni sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus te phrin las thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang ni sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus te phrin las thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa'i bsrung ba'o //
translated: The one who holds the essence of all things is the essence of the vow of aspiration, because it is the essence of the aspiration of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of the earth is the essence of the vow of mantra, because it is the essence of the mantra of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of all Buddhas is the essence of the vow of the great seal, because it is the essence of the great seal of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of all things is the essence of the vow of the pledge seal, because it is the essence of the pledge seal of all Buddhas.üîΩThe one who holds the essence of the earth is the essence of the vow of the doctrine seal, because it is the essence of the doctrine seal of all

original: so sor rtog pa skye ba med pa'i chos mkhyen nas 'gro ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba'i chos kun gyi ngo bo nyid 'chang ba'i gnod sbyin no //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa skye ba med pa'i chos mkhyen nas 'gro ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba'i chos kun gyi ngo bo nyid 'chang ba'i gnod sbyin no //
translated: The yak·π£a who holds the essence of all the teachings that are sought for the sake of the various beings, having known the unborn dharmas of discernment.

analyzed: nan tan byed pa'i shes rab chen po skad cig la chos kun gyi 'od gsal ba thugs su chud pa'i khu tshur ro //

analyzed: dad pa'i dbang pos chos kun khong du chud pas thub pa'i blo mchog ste lcags kyu'o //

analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos mi g-yo bas sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu 'jug cing 'chang bas na zhags pa'o //

analyzed: dran pa'i dbang pos sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum du byed pas na lcags sgrog go //

analyzed: ye shes me lce 'od 'bar gsal //

original: 'bebs pas ni dril bu'o //
analyzed: 'bebs pas ni dril bu'o //

original: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis padma gar gyi dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor badzra t'ikshna dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'o /

analyzed: // / don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas 'dod pa'i don grub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: 'jig rten dang thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub sgrub pa'i mchog tu gyur pas dam pa ste rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: The best, i.e., Vairochana, is the supreme means of accomplishing the mundane and supramundane powers.

analyzed: ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba ni rab tu byung ba'i cha byad can gyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyag rgya mnga' ba'o //
translated: The purifier of all evil destinies is the bearer of the seal of the Dharma-wheel in the guise of a renunciate.

analyzed: mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog ni thugs ka'i dang po'i sangs rgyas so //

analyzed: sems can thams cad rab sgrol byed ni 'khor lo gnyis kyi steng du pradzny'a dzny'a na m'urti'o //
translated: The liberator of all beings is Praj√±ƒÅj√±ƒÅnƒÅm·πõta on the two wheels.

original: don grub kyi mi bskyod pa'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: don grub kyi mi bskyod pa'i dbang du byas nas /
translated: From the point of view of Amoghasiddhi,

original: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba ste /
translated: he is the hero in the battle against the afflictions.

original: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i g-yul gyi nang na rdo rje bsnams nas gcig pu dpa' pa nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib @18b pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa dregs pas sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba'i g-yul gyi nang na rdo rje bsnams nas gcig pu dpa' pa nyon mongs pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib @18b pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa dregs pas sa gnon gyi phyag rgyas 'joms pa'o //
translated: In the battle that is aroused by the afflictions, he is the hero who holds the vajra and is alone, destroying the arrogance of the afflictions and the cognitive obscurations with the mudra of trampling on the earth.

original: dpal ldan ni zung du 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan ni zung du 'jug pa'o //
translated: Glorious means the union.

original: blo ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
analyzed: blo ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
translated: Mind means mirror-like pristine awareness.

original: de las byung ba'i sgeg par ldan pa ni zhal khro 'dzum dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i sgeg par ldan pa ni zhal khro 'dzum dang ldan pa'o //
translated: From that, he is born, and is endowed with charm, meaning he has a smiling face.

original: cung zad mche ba gtsigs shing bdud kyis mi bskyod pa brtan po'i khro bo mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: cung zad mche ba gtsigs shing bdud kyis mi bskyod pa brtan po'i khro bo mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'chang ba'o //
translated: He bares his fangs slightly, and is a fierce, terrifying form, unshakable by demons, firm, and wrathful.

original: rin chen gtsug phud kyi dbang du mdzad nas 'od zer gyis sprul pa'i lag pa brgya po kun du bskyod ni g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang gi gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa'o //
analyzed: rin chen gtsug phud kyi dbang du mdzad nas 'od zer gyis sprul pa'i lag pa brgya po kun du bskyod ni g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang gi gom pa'i stobs kyis gar byed pa'o //
translated: In the context of Ratnashikhin, he is shaking with light rays all the hundred emanated hands, dancing with the strength of right and left leg extended and drawn in.

original: dpal ldan ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor gyi ngo bo lag pa brgyas sprul pa'i phyag gis longs spyod pa ni nam mkha' khyab par sems can la dbang bskur nas gar byed pa ni ci dga' bar rol pa'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan ni bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor gyi ngo bo lag pa brgyas sprul pa'i phyag gis longs spyod pa ni nam mkha' khyab par sems can la dbang bskur nas gar byed pa ni ci dga' bar rol pa'o //
translated: Glorious means that the Bhagavat, the essence of Ratnashikhin, with the hands emanated by the hundred hands, enjoying, after empowering sentient beings pervading space, dancing as he likes.

original: rin chen ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas yi ge lam yongs su gyur pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du padma'i lte bar rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthil gyis gnon cing zhabs g-yon pa'i rkang pa'i mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis bsam gtan dang po'i tshangs pa'i yul
analyzed: rin chen ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang du mdzad nas yi ge lam yongs su gyur pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du padma'i lte bar rkang pa g-yas pa'i mthil gyis gnon cing zhabs g-yon pa'i rkang pa'i mtheb sen mo'i khyon gyis bsam gtan dang po'i tshangs pa'i yul
translated: In the context of RatnasamƒÅdhi, he is stepping on the center of the lotus on the earth mandala that is the transformation of the syllable lam with the sole of his right foot, and with the surface of the nail of the big toe of his left foot, the Brahma realm of the first concentration,

original: sa rtse nas gnon pa ste phyag gnyis kyis padma bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: sa rtse nas gnon pa ste phyag gnyis kyis padma bsnams pa'o //
translated: stepping on the peak of the earth, with two hands holding a lotus.

original: rin chen char 'bebs kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: rin chen char 'bebs kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: In the context of the empowerment of the rain of jewels,

original: don gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: don gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThe same meaning‚Äù and so forth.

original: don gcig ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: don gcig ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The same meaning is emptiness.

original: gnyis med ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis med ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: Nonduality is the absence of attributes.

original: chos kyi don ni smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: chos kyi don ni smon pa med pa'o //
translated: The meaning of phenomena is the absence of expectancy.

original: dam pa'i don ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: dam pa'i don ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The ultimate meaning is luminosity.

original: 'jigs med ni chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: 'jigs med ni chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: Fearlessness is the dharmadhatu.

original: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can ni me long lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam rig sna tshogs gzugs don can ni me long lta bu'o //
translated: The meaning of various forms of consciousness is the mirrorlike [wisdom].

original: sems ni kun gzhi gnas 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sems ni kun gzhi gnas 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The mind is the transformation of the all-base.

original: rnam shes rgyud dang ldan ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: rnam shes rgyud dang ldan ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pa'i so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
translated: The continuum of consciousness is the individually discerning wisdom, which is the transformation of the mental consciousness.

original: dngos don ma lus ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos don ma lus ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: The meaning of all things is emptiness.

original: dga' ba ni rdo rje sems ma'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ni rdo rje sems ma'o //
translated: Joy is Vajrasattva.

original: stong pa nyid dga' ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid dga' ni mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: The joy of emptiness is the absence of attributes.

original: 'dod chags blo ni rin chen ma'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags blo ni rin chen ma'o //
translated: The mind of passion is Ratnasambhava.

original: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa ni smon pa med pa ste chos ma'o //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'dod chags sogs spangs pa ni smon pa med pa ste chos ma'o //
translated: The abandonment of passion for existence and so forth is the absence of expectancy, which is Mamaki.

original: srid gsum dga' ba chen po ni 'od gsal ba ste las ma'o //
analyzed: srid gsum dga' ba chen po ni 'od gsal ba ste las ma'o //
translated: The great joy of the three worlds is the clear light, which is the action seal.

original: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pas dkar mo'o //
analyzed: sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pas dkar mo'o //
translated: She is white like a pure white cloud, because she is pure in morality.

original: sku mdog ser mo yin yang @19a * //üîΩ'od zer ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'i rin chen sems ma'o //üîΩrgyal po bshad pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' bas na /
analyzed: sku mdog ser mo yin yang @19a * // 'od zer ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od mnga' ba'i rin chen sems ma'o // rgyal po bshad pa nyi ma'i 'od mnga' bas na /
translated: Her body is yellow,üîΩbut her light is like the light of an autumn moon.

original: nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes pa'o //
analyzed: nyi ma shar ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes pa'o //
translated: She is beautiful like the orb of the rising sun, because she is the light of the sun of the teaching of the king.

original: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar bas mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon pa'o //
analyzed: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar bas mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon pa'o //
translated: Her nails are very red, indicating the thirty-two auspicious signs.

original: rin chen chags pa gsungs pa /
analyzed: rin chen chags pa gsungs pa /

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan bzang po aindra n'i la'i mdog can gyi zur phud kyi rtse mo can no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan bzang po aindra n'i la'i mdog can gyi zur phud kyi rtse mo can no //
translated: She has the five buddhas as her auspicious topknot, the tip of which is the color of sapphire.üîΩTherefore,

original: des na / skra mchog mthon ka'i rtse mo can //
analyzed: des na / skra mchog mthon ka'i rtse mo can //
translated: her excellent hair is the tip of a peacock‚Äôs tail feather.

original: zhes bya'o // nor bu legs par bshad pa //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // nor bu legs par bshad pa //
translated: The excellent jewel is explained.

original: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal te 'od zer kha dog lnga pa can dang / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can no //
analyzed: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal te 'od zer kha dog lnga pa can dang / sprul pa'i sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can no //
translated: The great jewel is the glorious radiance, with five-colored light rays, and the crown of the five emanated Buddhas.

original: rin chen khro gnyer bshad pa zhabs g-yon brkyang nas 'jig rten gyi khams kun du bskyod cing /
analyzed: rin chen khro gnyer bshad pa zhabs g-yon brkyang nas 'jig rten gyi khams kun du bskyod cing /
translated: The jewel frown is explained as the left leg extended, shaking all the world systems.

original: zhabs g-yas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis gzugs kyi khams gnon pa'o //
analyzed: zhabs g-yas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stobs kyis gzugs kyi khams gnon pa'o //
translated: The right leg is the power of the bases of magical powers, trampling the form realm.

original: rin chen 'od bshad ba /
analyzed: rin chen 'od bshad ba /
translated: The jewel light is explained as

original: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //
analyzed: de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang //

translated: The wisdom that knows the emptiness that is like space is the attachment.

original: rin chen rnon po bshad pa //

translated: It penetrates the minds of all sentient beings, because it penetrates sentient beings with compassion and with wisdom it cuts through the afflictions of sentient beings. It is sharp because it is as fast as the mind.

original: rin chen 'khor lo bshad pa /
analyzed: rin chen 'khor lo bshad pa /

analyzed: dga' ba'i stobs kyis sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pas 'khor lo'o //

analyzed: skad cig ma thams cad kyi blos mngon par rtogs pas na blo gros rgya mtsho'o //

translated: He is PratibhƒÅnak≈´·π≠a, because he has the eloquence of the method of the various vehicles and because he thinks about the meaning of the higher and higher and the definite goodness of beings.

analyzed: khams gsum las theg pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i mthu chen po mnga' zhing theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas pa'i mthu chen po brnyes pas na mthu chen po thob pa'o //
translated: He is MahƒÅ¬≠sthƒÅma¬≠prƒÅpta, because he has the great power of the three vehicles for going forth from the three realms and because he has attained the great power of abiding in the result of the one vehicle.

original: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag ni ngan song kun 'dren no //
analyzed: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag ni ngan song kun 'dren no //
translated: He is Sarva¬≠jagad¬≠dhitai·π£i·πá, because he is the self of the purification of the elements of affliction and because he leads all beings to the lower realms.

original: las kyi khams kyi mya ngan dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal zad par byed pas na mya ngan mun pa nges par 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: las kyi khams kyi mya ngan dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal zad par byed pas na mya ngan mun pa nges par 'joms pa'o //
translated: He is ≈öoka¬≠moha¬≠pra¬≠nƒÅ≈õaka, because he is the exhaustion of the suffering of the elements of karma and because he destroys the darkness of sorrow.

original: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi chu'i rgya mtsho kun las brgal pa'i ye shes kyi dra ba mnga' bas dra ba can gyi 'od do //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi chu'i rgya mtsho kun las brgal pa'i ye shes kyi dra ba mnga' bas dra ba can gyi 'od do //
translated: He is JƒÅlinƒ´prabha, because he has the net of intuition that crosses over the ocean of desire, hatred, and delusion.

original: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba ni gnyen po'i rnal 'byor zla ba chos pa lta bu 'gro ba kun 'khor ba'i dgon pa las dbyung nas ye shes kyi lang tsho bskyod pas na zla 'od gzhon nu'o //
analyzed: sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba ni gnyen po'i rnal 'byor zla ba chos pa lta bu 'gro ba kun 'khor ba'i dgon pa las dbyung nas ye shes kyi lang tsho bskyod pas na zla 'od gzhon nu'o //
translated: He is Candraprabha, because he is the youth of intuition that has emerged from the wilderness of practice, and that leads all beings out of the wilderness of cyclic life, like the moon of the practice of the antidote.

analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i ye shes kyi nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pas na 'od dpag tu med do //
translated: He is AmitƒÅbha, because he has abandoned the afflictions and the instinctual habit-patterns of the secondary afflictions by means of the intuition of AmitƒÅbha.

original: snying rje chen po dang shes rab kyi thabs nam mkha' lta bu skye gnas las dngos grub gsum don yod par mdzad bas na nam mkha'i snying po'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po dang shes rab kyi thabs nam mkha' lta bu skye gnas las dngos grub gsum don yod par mdzad bas na nam mkha'i snying po'o //
translated: He is ƒÄkƒÅ≈õagarbha, because he is the sky-like means of great compassion and wisdom, which unfailingly accomplishes the three spiritual goals in the three life-cycle states.

original: bdag dang bdag gir lta ba'i sgrib pa'i 'du @20b shes kyi don spangs shed rnam par shis pa'i don gyi gzugs 'dzin sel cing 'gog par byed pas na sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //

translated: Since he holds the form that has the meaning of the thorough knowledge of the object of the notional attachment to the view of 'I' and 'mine', and since he eliminates and stops the obscurations, he is the 'Eliminator of Obscurations'.

original: lha mo brgyad kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
analyzed: lha mo brgyad kyi dbang du mdzad nas /
translated: With regard to the eight goddesses,

translated: since he holds a wish-fulfilling jewel in his two hands,

analyzed: sems can kun yid yul dang ldan te rin chen sgeg mo'o //
translated: he is the 'Jewel Lovely', since he is endowed with the object of the mind of all sentient beings.

analyzed: mar me'i mchod sdong bsnams nas 'khrul pa'i mun pa sel bas na mar me ma'o //

original: 'jam dpal go 'phang thob par shog / slob dpon chen po zla ba bzang po grags pa'i dpal gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /

translated: May I attain the state of Manjushri.üîΩThis is the completion of the work of the great master Candrakirti.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po shr'i ma h'a dza na dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba chen po dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pandi ta chen po shr'i ma h'a dza na dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo ts'a ba chen po dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
translated: It was translated and finalized by the Indian abbot, the great pandit Shri Mahajana, and the great translator, the monk Pal-ma-tra.
